subject: My name is Mr Chris Mathew A
body:
My name is Mr Chris Mathew Acting Director ATM Card programming
department of CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA CBN.
We have been instructed by Mr President Bola Ahmed Tinubu to contact
you via your email and make sure that your long overdue INHERITANCE
FUND is released to you through a CERTIFIED ATM VISA CARD worth
$36,000,000 to be delivered to you through an approved courier
company.
We wish to inform you that your ATM CARD is ready and the delivery of
your your ATM card will cost you the sum of $130 only and bear in mind
that your ATM CARD will expire in a few months time if you do not use
your pin before then.
contact us with your mailing address and telephone number immediately
with the mentioned information to enable us proceed.
Regards
Mr. Chris Mathew
Acting Director Operaction Dept.

subject: Re:   My name is Mr Chris Mathew A
body:
Hello Mr. Chris Mathew,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my long overdue fund. I appreciate your efforts in contacting me through email. I would like to know more about the process of receiving the CERTIFIED ATM VISA CARD.

Could you please provide me with some additional information? How exactly does this ATM card work? Will I be able to withdraw cash from any ATM machine? Also, could you clarify the cost you mentioned for the delivery of the card?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Alexander
